(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Create an 8/8 blue Kraken creature token with hexproof.

trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Destroy target creature an opponent controls with power 2 or less.
II — Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
III — Exile target opponent's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。） I — 消灭目标由对手操控且力量等于或小于2的生物。 II — 目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非生物且非地的牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。 III — 放逐目标对手的坟墓场。

(You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

If the creature had power 4 or greater, create two of those tokens instead.

trans-unit.target: 渴求真知

trans-unit.resname: THB·354 | Thirst for Meaning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an enchantment card.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。然后除非你弃一张结界牌，否则弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: THB·354 | Thirst for Meaning | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A sip of recollection, an ocean of regrets.
trans-unit.target: 轻啜往昔回忆，跌落悔恨汪洋。

trans-unit.resname: THB·355 | Gray Merchant of Asphodel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gray Merchant of Asphodel
trans-unit.target: 安福陵的暗贾

trans-unit.resname: THB·355 | Gray Merchant of Asphodel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位对手各失去X点生命，X为你的黑色献力。你获得若干生命，其数量等同于以此法失去的生命总和。（由你操控之永久物的法术力费用当中每含有一个{B}，你的黑色献力就加一。）

trans-unit.resname: THB·356 | Thrill of Possibility | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thrill of Possibility
trans-unit.target: 快意拼搏

trans-unit.resname: THB·356 | Thrill of Possibility | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.\nDraw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 弃一张牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: THB·356 | Thrill of Possibility | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Right now, in these first moments of creation, it is simultaneously nothing and everything."
trans-unit.target: 「眼下，在这创造的最初时刻，灿烂成果或破烂废铁就在一念之间。」

trans-unit.resname: THB·357 | Wolfwillow Haven | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wolfwillow Haven
trans-unit.target: 狼林庇护地

trans-unit.resname: THB·357 | Wolfwillow Haven | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant land\nWhenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.\n{4}{G}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. Activate only during your turn.
trans-unit.target: 结附于地 每当所结附的地横置以产生法术力时，其操控者额外加{G}。 {4}{G}，牺牲CARDNAME：派出一个2/2绿色的狼衍生生物。只能于你的回合中起动此异能。
